relationships.description: Potter has been to Snape's office before.
Snape is mentioned as someone who might administer the truth potion.
Potter is concerned that Snape might put Hermione in trouble.
Potter is also concerned that Snape might put Dobby in trouble.
Potter is secretly in contact with Sirius.
